info.title: Hockey - NHL
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. NHL - National Hockey League

get.summary: The teams endpoint will be your source for team na...
get.description: The teams endpoint will be your source for team names, locations, abbreviations, and IDs.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: If you are permissioned for the /events resource, ...
get.description: If you are permissioned for the /events resource, you have access to the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, and play-by-play.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box or pbp requests.
   Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with box.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with pbp.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Returns games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only relevant when eventTypeId = 2 (Postseason) is selected
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: This endpoint allows you to select schedule and sc...
get.description: This endpoint allows you to select schedule and score information for just one team.  Getting information for a single team returns only schedule and score information.  If you want detailed event information, you use the example about with the eventId.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Returns games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only relevant when eventTypeId = 2 (Postseason) is selected
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for NHL events.  (Play-by-play is not an option.)

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box or pbp requests.
   Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with box.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Returns games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only relevant when eventTypeId = 2 (Postseason) is selected
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team.
 Default - false

parameters.name: conference
parameters.description:
Conference returns teams ranked by conference instead of division.
 Default - false

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.description: This will return anyone who has played since the beginning of the entered year (season).

parameters.name: sinceYearLast
parameters.description: Begin listing players with this season.  Enter as YYYY.

parameters.name: languageId

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

  Default - json

get.summary: Historical rosters provide biographical informatio...
get.description: Historical rosters provide biographical information for players that played for a team in a single specified season.

Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: playerId

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept

get.summary: This will return anyone who has played in an NHL A...
get.description: This will return anyone who has played in an NHL All-Star game.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Enter only the playerId and 'enc=true' to get a pl...
get.description: Enter only the playerId and 'enc=true' to get a player's career stats.  Anything else is ignored when 'enc=true'.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - All event types

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
Encyclopedia - If 'true', full career and season-by-season totals will be returned.
   Notes:
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.  If playerId is omitted, 'enc=true' will be ignored.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NHL - Player splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned.
 * If 'all' is used, then all the splits are returned.
 * If not used, only the official totals will be returned (default = -1).
 * Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
 -- A full list of the available splitId codes can be found using the âdecodesâ resource.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - All event types

  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: By default, results include all injuries for a pla...
get.description:
By default, results include all injuries for a player (a) during the time period selected, (b) if the injury has not healed and (c) for all the teams the player was on during the time period.
 To return only those injuries while a player is on a specific team, you must include /teams/:teamId in the URI.

get.summary: NHL - Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  Default - Goals Scored

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - All event types

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NHL - Daily Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  Default - Goals Scored

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
Leaders among specified conference only.
  Default - all NHL

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Returns games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only relevant when eventTypeId = 2 (Postseason) is selected
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box or pbp requests.

parameters.name: allSeasons
parameters.description:
For seasonStructure only. To get complete history of league, select allSeasons=TRUE. Only those permissioned for all historic data will be able to utilize the 'allSeasons' option.
  Default - false

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.
